sn42.1:1.2: Atha kho caṇḍo gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho caṇḍo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.1:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn42.1:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti?
sn42.1:1.6: Rāgassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:1.9: Dosassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:1.12: Mohassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti.
sn42.1:1.14: Ayaṃ kho, gāmaṇi, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn42.1:2.1: Idha pana, gāmaṇi, ekaccassa rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn42.1:2.2: Rāgassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:2.5: Dosassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:2.8: Mohassa pahīnattā pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ na pātukaroti.
sn42.1:2.10: Ayaṃ kho, gāmaṇi, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn42.1:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, caṇḍo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.1:3.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn42.1:3.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn42.1:3.5: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
